you
suggested but sadly, my computer can't handle the forum format. My
eyes=
ight being very (very) poor, means that I use some special text
enlargement=
 and speech-out packages, which read everything on the page,
which as I rec=
ently told someone else, means absolutely "everything",
which is a bit of a=
 problem, hence I tend to stick with email format
groups like this one.

Th=
anks again to everyone who chipped in to answer my query.

Yours

Dean
